comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content:
"Staalstraat street" is too much street

Straat in Dutch means street. So Staalstraat is enough. If you want to translate it, you can make it Staal Street or Steel Street (as "staal" means "steel").

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Michiel2005: Well, this is only my special way to keep the local language and at the same time translate into English. Sometimes I translate the whole name though. Same procedure for street names from Sweden and other countries. :)
Thanks for your observation!
/Anna B.
